name: Turbo Boom!
description:
Race a rally car on narrow tracks filled with explosive obstacles. Drive with a top-down birds-eye view for more visibility of upcoming obstacles. Use the ghost runs of professional racers to improve your driving skills then compete against your friends and show them you are faster with the online leaderboards.

Your rally car is fitted with specialized shells that eject to protect the driver, but; you only have so many! Collect all the trophies, perfect all the tracks and prove you are a world-class rally driver.
